alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 7:12PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Mellette and southeastern Jackson Counties through 745 PM MDT/845 PM CDT/... At 712 PM MDT/812 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles west of Corn Creek, or 20 miles southeast of Kadoka, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Corn Creek around 830 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
